Posts.Content: LisaJ0127 wrote: sad to say I am a Psychologist and am consumed with worry. Radiologist changed from fine needle to core and had very different opinion than first radiologist. He is going to give results to my surgeon but I picked up on his concern and called surgeon to expect results. I guess it best she explains, she did my moms and daughters surgeries. My grandma had bc too. I think I've always felt I would get it too. Age 51 and loving grandma to 3 and 6 children of my own, nursed all even twins. Log in to post a reply
